com.avaya.jtapi.tsapi

Interface ITsapiPeer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JtapiPeer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJtapiPeer, TsapiPeer

    public interface ITsapiPeer
extends JtapiPeer
    ITsapiPeer extends JtapiPeer to allow applications a mechanism to specify the vendor(s) they want to negotiate data with.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addVendor(java.lang.String vendorName, java.lang.String versions)
      This method can be used to set the vendor the application wants to exchange data with.
      void setSSLContext(javax.net.ssl.SSLContext context)
      This method is used by applications to set the SSLContext which will be used when connecting to secure TLINKs.

      • Methods inherited from interface javax.telephony.JtapiPeer

        getName, getProvider, getServices

    • Method Detail

      • addVendor

        void addVendor(java.lang.String vendorName,
               java.lang.String versions)
        This method can be used to set the vendor the application wants to exchange data with. The interfaces for data are in javax.telephony.privatedata.

        This method should be invoked before the application invokes getProvider().

        To set multiple vendors an application must invoke this method multiple times.

      • setSSLContext

        void setSSLContext(javax.net.ssl.SSLContext context)
        This method is used by applications to set the SSLContext which will be used when connecting to secure TLINKs. This overrides the normal procedure used in JTAPI to create an SSLContext.
        Parameters:
        context - the SSLContext instance to use
